import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {DataContext} from '../Context' import '../css/Products.css' export class Products extends Component { static contextType = DataContext; render() { const {products,addCart, reduction, increase} = this.context; return (
{ products.map(product =>(

{product.title}

${product.price}

{product.description}

{product.count}
)) }
) } } export default Products
